forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
